Text: One of the funniest satires on politics I've ever seen. Dustin Hoffman is brilliant in this.

Did you know that George W. Bush actually used quotes from this movie in his speeches after 9/11? Unbelieveable! Look at some similarities between the 2nd gulf war and this movie. Remember private Lynch? Totally inspired by this movie!
Thanks for the up btw EziO!
Video is grainy on a large screen.
